text:
Watched CNA's documentary on Crest Secondary School. These students are not bad, they just need time and many encouraging words to motivate them. Whether they can understand or not, we need to have more patience in them and understand why they cannot make it in their selected choice.

The teachers are doing their best to help and guide. I hope everyone can enjoy their time and achieve their goals.

加油！

Students are very rude. School should teach the students on how to queue for trains and lifts. Whole crowd was queuing in an orderly manner for the train and this lower sec boy from this school just came and cut queue and boarded the train, not even caring about the elderlies in the queue
Crest Sec is the best, not gonna this school. All the students are NT (Normal Technical) only. It's based on specialist school and getting 2, when getting an N-level results

Love the curriculum here and had a overseas trip during sec 2 I enjoyed myself alot thanks to the teachers for planning it . It was a lifetime opportunity to have such a gd sch to have a overseas trip and lj and workshops etc and even visiting ite for ignite and a full day in ite to learn more about the courses . Thankyou to the teachers for the hardwork :D
